rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with modern Scandinavian design elements and minimalistic decor.
Spacious living area featuring a combination of Scandinavian aesthetics, natural light, and functional space for everyday activities.
Efficient kitchen with open layout adjoining the living area to encourage a fluid movement as per Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.
Small but comfortable servant's quarters designed to be discreet yet functional with Scandinavian simplicity in mind.
A dedicated library space that offers a quiet retreat for reading and relaxation, incorporating natural materials and ample shelving to support Vastu's principles of harmony.

A master bedroom designed with Scandinavian style for comfort and elegance. It includes a spacious balcony adjacent to the room, providing an outdoor relaxation space that aligns with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Main entrance ensuring a welcoming approach in line with Scandinavian design and Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.
Balcony access door to the master bedroom balcony, offering privacy and outdoor space.
Large windows integrated into walls to maximize natural light in accordance with Scandinavian design and Vastu principles.
Window designed for the servant's quarters to ensure sufficient natural light as per building norms and Vastu guidelines.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom with Scandinavian aesthetics and its own spacious balcony ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles for energy flow.
Well-equipped bathroom complementing the bedroom on the first floor, designed with modern fixtures and efficient use of space as per building norms.

openings.description: Balcony access door for the second bedroom, ensuring ample outdoor space and following Vastu principles for positive energy circulation.
Window in the bathroom to allow natural ventilation and light, conforming with local building norms.
